June 18, 1938 D Gateshead Contest
Gateshead Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
gateshead-contest
None
Wayside Scenes
Town Hall, Gateshead March contest - 1st Ravensworth Colliery, 2nd Hartley Main Colliery. Hymn tune contest - 1st Ravensworth, 2nd Hartley Main. Best section 2 bands - 1st South Moor Colliery, 2nd Hunwick Silver. 10 bands competed.
Jan. 22, 2014, 11:59 a.m. Jan. 22, 2014, 12:08 p.m.
